info.title: Bank Credit Facility Contract
info.description:
A frame contract that defines an overall credit line for a hierarchy of subordinated bank contracts.

The subordinated bank contracts can be bank account contracts (drawings) of different kinds of products (for example, current account and loan) having multiple contract currencies. It is also possible to subordinate other facilities, thus building a complex contractual hierarchy.
You can use this API to query and read bank credit facility contracts.

Each Bank Credit Facility Contract contains additional information like the main business partner (borrower) or participation conditions which serve as a restriction towards the allowed subordinated bank contracts. A bank master contract is a frame contract between a bank and its customer that is based on a hierarchy of participating bank contracts. Bank master contracts and the associated hierarchies are set up for features such as combined settlement, combined statement and so on.

Bank Credit Facility Contract is a type of a bank master contract.

x-sap-shortText: Query and read bank credit facility contracts using this synchronous inbound service

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
A universal unique identifier of a Bank Credit Facility Contract.  
GDT: NOSC_UUID

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

BankContractUUID.title: A UUID of a bank contract.

ParentBankContractUUID.title: A UUID of the parent bank contract in the hierarchy.
ParentBankContractUUID.description:
Remark: 
An entry of hierarchy belonging to the 1st level refers to the UUID of BankCreditFacilityContract.
GDT: NOSC_UUID

LevelOrdinalNumberValue.title: Ordinal number of an level of a bank contract in the hierarchy.
LevelOrdinalNumberValue.description:
Remark: 
Hierarchy starts with the first level.
Use:
Used to specify the level on which a bank contract is located in an hierarchical structure.
GDT: OrdinalNumberValue_V1

SubordinatedBankContractNumberValue.title: A number of subordinated bank contracts of one level below.
SubordinatedBankContractNumberValue.description:
Remark: 
Only spcified for a bank contract of type "Bank MasterContract" 
GDT: OrdinalNumberValue_V1

BankContractTypeCode.title: A coded repesentation of a type of a bank contract.
BankContractTypeCode.description:
Comment: 
A hierarchy has at each level a subordinated bank contract that could in turn be another bank master contract or an bank account contract (leaf).
Constraint: 
Only 1 - Bank Master Contract and 3 - Bank Account Contract are supported.
Integrity Condition: 
In case of BankContractTypeCode is 1 - BankMasterContract BankMasterContract is specified.
In case of BankContractTypeCode is 3 - BankAccountContract BankAccountContract is specified.
Code values:
1 - Bank Master Contract
2 - Bank Card Contract
3 - Bank Account Contract
GDT:ParticipantBankContractTypeCode

BankMasterContract.title: A subordinated bank master contract participating in a bank credit facility contract.
BankMasterContract.description:
Comment:
A bank master contract is a frame contract between a bank and its customer that is based
on a hierarchy of participating bank contracts.

BankAccountContract.title: A subordinated bank account contract participating in a bank credit facility contract.
BankAccountContract.description:
Comment:
A bank account is a contractual agreement between a credit institute and customer,
which is based on the customer's request for opening a bank account and contains among others,	he bank account type, account holder / authorized drawer(s), general terms and conditions.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.title: Hierarchy
com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.description:
A hierarchy of subordinated bank contracts.
Comment:
Subordinated bank contracts are participating in the bank credit facility contract.
Remark:
subordinated bank contract of type 1 - Bank Master Contract is also called "commitment" in context of a bank credit facility hierarchy.A subordinated bank contract of type 3 - Bank Account Contract is called "drawing" in context of a bank credit facility hierarchy.

In case of BankContractTypeCode is 3 - BankAccountContract BankAccountContract is specified.
Code values:
1 - Bank Master Contract
2 - Bank Card Contract
3 - Bank Account Contract

ID.title: Is a unique identifier of a seasonal limit within a bank credit facility contract.

ValidityPeriod.title: The Validity Period of the Seasonal Limit

DescriptionCode.title: A coded representation of a description of a seasonal limit.

BankAccountLimitTypeCode.title: Is the coded representation of the type of a bank account limit.
BankAccountLimitTypeCode.description:
A seasonal limit increases either the committed or tolerated limit of a bank credit facility contract.Only BankAccountLimitTypeCode "9 - Granted Credit Group Limit " and "10 - Tolerated Overdraft Group Limit" are supported. 
There may more than one seasonal limit with the supported BankAccountLimitTypeCodes.
GDT: BankAccountLimitTypeCode

Amount.title: Specifies the amount assigned to a seasonal limit.
Amount.description:
Integrity Condition:
CurrencyCode of Amount has to be equal to CurrencyCode of bank credit facility contract.
GDT: Amount

BoundaryAmount.title: Specifies the boundary amount of a seasonal limit.
BoundaryAmount.description:
Integrity Condition:
CurrencyCode of SeasonalLimit BoundaryAmount has to be equal to CurrencyCode of bank credit facility contract.
GDT: Amount

RecurrenceIndicator.title: Indicates whether the seasonal limit has a recurrence.
RecurrenceIndicator.description:
Integrity Condition:
If RecurrenceIndicator is true a Recurrence is available.
GDT: Indicator

RecurrenceMappableIndicator.title: Indicates that the recurrence for the seasonal limit is mappable.
RecurrenceMappableIndicator.description:
Integrity Condition:
If RecurrenceMappableIndicator is false no Recurrence is specified.
Remark:
The indicator is false if a recurrence is maintained in the system which cannot be mapped to Recurrence. An example is a monthly recurrence on 15th and 31st of a month.
RecurrenceMappableIndicator is null, if no Recurrence is available.
GDT: Indicator

Recurrence.title: A representation for the repeated occurrence of the effectiveness of a seasonal limit within a time period or within a time frame.

MappableIndicator.title: Indicates that the seasonal limit is mappable.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.title: SeasonalLimit
com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.description:
A Seasonal Limit is a limit that is granted to a bank credit facility contract for a period of time (seasonal).
Constraints:
Only SeasonalLimit of type code 1 (Additional  Seasonal Limit) is supported.
Only Seasonal Limits for one-time increase/decrease or recurrent increase/decrease by fix amount are supported. Seasoanal Limits with settings for duration are not  supported..

ValidityPeriod.title: The Validity Period of the Seasonal Limit

DescriptionCode.title: A coded representation of a description of a seasonal limit.

BankAccountLimitTypeCode.title: Is the coded representation of the type of a bank account limit.
BankAccountLimitTypeCode.description:
A seasonal limit increases either the committed or tolerated limit of a bank credit facility contract.Only BankAccountLimitTypeCode "9 - Granted Credit Group Limit " and "10 - Tolerated Overdraft Group Limit" are supported. 
There may more than one seasonal limit with the supported BankAccountLimitTypeCodes.
GDT: BankAccountLimitTypeCode

Amount.title: Specifies the amount assigned to a seasonal limit.
Amount.description:
Integrity Condition:
CurrencyCode of Amount has to be equal to CurrencyCode of bank credit facility contract.
GDT: Amount

BoundaryAmount.title: Specifies the boundary amount of a seasonal limit.
BoundaryAmount.description:
Integrity Condition:
CurrencyCode of SeasonalLimit BoundaryAmount has to be equal to CurrencyCode of bank credit facility contract.
GDT: Amount

RecurrenceIndicator.title: Indicates whether the seasonal limit has a recurrence.
RecurrenceIndicator.description:
Integrity Condition:
If RecurrenceIndicator is true a Recurrence is available.
GDT: Indicator

Recurrence.title: A representation for the repeated occurrence of the effectiveness of a seasonal limit within a time period or within a time frame.

CurrencyCode.title: Currency unit in accordance with the ISO 4217 three-character code.
CurrencyCode.description:
A currency must always be specified.
GDT: CurrencyCode

com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.description: Is an amount with the corresponding currency unit.

BusinessProcessChainUUID.title: UUID of the business process chain to which the hosting business object is assigned to.

BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode.title: BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode
BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode.description:
BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode is the coded representation of the banking business transaction which
is associated with the business process chain to which the hosting buisiness object is assigned to.
Remark:
If BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode is not specfied, in case of update code value
"300031 - Ad Hoc Bank Credit Facility Contract Change" and in case of create
"300030 - Bank Credit Facility Contract Change" will be used by default. 
BDT: BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode

com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.title: Business Process Chain Assignment
com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.description: Is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.

BusinessProcessChainUUID.title: UUID of the business process chain to which the hosting business object is assigned to.

"300030 - Bank Credit Facility Contract Change" will be used by default. 
BDT: BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode

BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode.title: BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode
BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode.description:
BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode is the coded representation of the banking business transaction which
is associated with the business process chain to which the hosting buisiness object is assigned to.
Remark:
If BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode is not specfied, in case of update code value
"300031 - Ad Hoc Bank Credit Facility Contract Change" and in case of create
"300030 - Bank Credit Facility Contract Change" will be used by default. 
BDT: BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode

FrequencyCode.title:
A FrequencyCode specifies the frequency of the recurrence as a code.
Constraint: Only codes 4 (Daily), 5 (Weekly), 6 (Monthly) and 7 (Yearly) are supported.Integrity Condition: In case of FrequencyCode 5 (Weekly) WeekdayCode has to be specified, in case of FrequencyCode 6 (Monthly) DayOfMonth has to be specified, n case of FrequencyCode 7 (Yearly) DayOfMonth and Month have to be specified.

FrequencyValue.title: FrequencyValue specifies the number of units derived from the frequency codes that lie between two occurrences.

WeekdayCode.title:
A coded representation of a day in a week.
Use: The WeekdayCode is used to identify a single day in a week. For example to set the first day of a week.

Month.title: Month specifies the month in which a recurrence takes place.

DayOfMonth.title: DayOfMonth specifies the day in a month in the Gregorian calendar on which a recurrence takes place. 31 is equal to the last day of the month.

KeyDateWorkingDayAdjustmentRuleCode.title: A KeyDateWorkingDayAdjustmentRuleCode specifies the rule for adjusting a given key date to a working day.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.title: Recurrence
com.sap.gateway.default.bankcreditfacili.description: A representation for the repeated occurrence of an event within a time period or within a time frame.
